author: sdeboy
msg: Added a no-arg getLogger method that returns a Logger using the caller's class name (relies on the new LocationInfo classes).

author: sdeboy
msg: MapFilter converts an event messages which implement java.util.Map into properties on the event.  (Similar to ReflectionFilter but map based instead of JavaBeans based).
If the map contains an entry with a "message" key, the value of the entry is used as the rendered message.

author: sdeboy
msg: Had to set the fully qualified class to Category so that parsing would correctly find the source class in the exception

author: sdeboy
msg: LocationInfoFilter generates LocationInfo for an event only if the provided expression evaluates to true.
